file_content.text: Look. The dream-rock glows. Dead Voss said you should take the dream-rock once the nightmares are dead.
This is it. Either this works, or I go insane.
Wish me luck.
Thank you.
If this fails, someone will pay.
This better work.
What's happening?
Voss. Wake up. The healing is done. You are whole warrior again. Strong. Brave.
How are the voices? We done here?
Are you feeling well, my master? Have you banished the tormenting voices?
My master, are you alright? Are the ghosts still in your mind?
I'm not sure what I just witnessed, but it was the most remarkable thing. These seeds you used are most unusual, and that crystal.
But more to the point, have you warded off your ghostly visitors?
I can hear myself think. That's promising.
I think so.
They will not rebel against me again.
I crushed them.
Andru? Ergast? Kalatosh? Horak-Mul? Nothing. Looks like I'm clear.
Let's find out.
Good to hear it. I called for the others; they'll get this guy to the space station so he can leave the planet.
Excellent. I've already notified the others about escorting your helper here offworld.
If only there were such a cure for me, master.
I have contacted the ship in your name. Your other servants will come for the Gormak soon.
I'm relieved, my lord. I hope you don't mind that I took the liberty of contacting the others on your ship.
They've agreed to smuggle the Gormak through Voss-Ka and up to the space station.
Have them use one of the supply crates off the ship to move him. We can't have the Voss noticing him.
Make sure they hide him.
If the Voss notice him, I don't think they'll approve. Dress him up.
Try to disguise him.
Thank you for doing that. Tell them I'll meet them at the ship.
Good.
Yes, my master.
Of course, my lord.
Sure thing.
As you say, my lord.
What is this? The Gormak do not have strange glowing crystals. It looks like corruption. We should destroy it.
I suspect it's important to the ritual. It wasn't visible outside the dream.
No. We might need it.
I'm inclined to agree.
Absolutely. [Destroy it.]
Hmm. It didn't work. Crystal is too strong. Let Gormak try....
The ghost told me to use it, not destroy it.
Those weren't my instructions.
I will not touch it. It is corruption.
You will use it or you will never leave Voss.
We had an agreement.
Fine. I will help you. But I do not like you.
I thought the Gormak were warriors, not cowards.
What's the matter? Afraid?
We are great warriors. Never give up fighting.
You are using Voss powers to perform a Voss ritual. The crystal is no more corrupt than you.
You are corruption.
I did not choose corruption. Corruption found me.
You're right. I said I would help the ritual. I am corrupt, but I am not a liar like the Voss.
Voss. Why are you here?
I'm here for healing.
For the ritual.
I am not Voss and neither is he.
Don't call me Voss.
There are only Voss.
This appears to be some sort of Voss holocron, though I'm not certain.
Is this a holocron?
What is a holocron?
I am Dal-Rin. I am the teacher of the rock.
Do not trust it. It is Voss nightmare. Voss vision-haver. It should be killed.
Teach me how to use this stone, honored one.
Quiet, Gormak.
He's just the image of a dead Voss.
I don't like this unkillable Voss. Teach us the ritual, quick!
We need him to teach us the rest of the ritual.
Calm down.
Fine, then. Tell us how to use the corrupt crystal or we kill you.
I am already dead.
We made the rock to ward off the nightmare.
Healer. Take the rock. Meditate. Transform the nightmare. Patient. Defeat the nightmare. Use the rock.
Which one of us is the patient and which one is the healer? How do we use the stone?
I don't get it.
Patient. You with the fragmented mind. Healer. Him with the twisted form.
What is the nightmare? And what does it turn into?
Nightmare?
The nightmare is the disease. It becomes flesh. It dies.
Lesson over. Safe journey.
He uses the rock on the nightmares, and then I fight them? And then I take the rock and receive healing?
I think I understand.
Correct. Safe journey.
I don't understand. Voss speaks in strange words. What are we doing?
When the nightmares appear, you use the dream-rock. Then I kill them.
Cleansing my mind.
When the nightmares arrive, I'll show you what to do.
Just follow my lead.
We're going to kill some nightmares.
We're fighting ghosts.
I follow you. I hope you're right.
Let us be quick.
I will meet you at the Dark Heart. Protect yourself from corruption.
You keep your promises. Not like a Voss.
Tell me about ritual. The Gormak know many rituals, but they are different from Voss rituals.
The description I have is vague. Something about nightmares.
I don't have all the details.
I am supposed to go to the Nightmare Lands and use a rock....
There's some kind of rock.
I believe it's in a place called the Dark Heart. And there's something about a rock....
It's in the Nightmare Lands.
I listen.
This ritual is strange. I have heard of Nightmare Lands. I have not heard of dream-rock.
Is dream-walking the place where you talked to me? This ritual sounds corrupt.
I will show you what to do. Don't worry about it.
Just follow my lead.
Dream-walking is what you do when you use the Voss corruption to walk in your dreams.
Yes, it is.
I don't like it.
It probably is corrupt, but I need to be healed.
Perhaps.
Voss must have very serious disease.
I made promise. I am not a liar. But the Nightmare Lands are bad place. Full of corruption.
Many strong warriors go mad there. Shamans can protect themselves for a little while, but not for long.
Well, hopefully this won't take too long.
I'll be quick then.
I'll take your advice to heart, but I need this ritual.
Thanks for the warning.
There's nothing in the Nightmare Lands I can't handle.
I'm not afraid.
You are not like Voss. You are brave, like Gormak warrior.
I hope you understand what you do. I don't understand at all, but I will do it to reach the stars.
You must protect yourself from the nightmares. I will meet you there.
Free me from cage, take me to the stars. I help.
Voss. What do you want?
You are corruption. You must leave or we must kill you. It is your choice.
I need your help to heal me.
I mean you no harm.
What do you mean "corruption"? I came here for healing.
Corruption?
Yes, I am corrupted. I need you to heal me of my corruption.
That's why I need you.
The Voss are the corruption. Their nightmares are the corruption. Kill the Voss, kill the nightmares. No more corruption.
Gormak don't help Voss. Don't use strange nightmare powers. Don't use corruption.
I'm not Voss. They are trying to stop me.
The Voss are my enemies.
The Voss stop you? Hmm. Maybe enemy of Voss is friend of Gormak?
How can I prove that I mean you no harm?
I don't want to hurt you.
Hmm. I tell the other Gormak we need friends, but they do not listen.
Help me, or I will tell your friends about your dream-walking ability.
Yet you are dream-walking.
No. Don't tell. Is corruption. Corruption must be killed.
We make exchange. I will help you if you will help me.
If it will win me your friendship, then I accept.
Sounds fair.
What kind of exchange did you have in mind?
Exchange?
I'm listening.
Gormak are great warriors. For many hundreds of seasons, they fight all things--the beasts, the Voss and each other.
I am tired of fighting always. The Gormak must take to the stars, find friends. Find peace, away from the Voss.
The Gormak do not have many, many ships. Need to get up Voss pillar to reach the sky. The Voss do not like this. Turn us away. Kill us.
Help me complete my ritual, and I will get you through Voss-Ka and into space.
You must give in return.
I don't know many rituals. I am not sure I can help. I will try if you will help me, though.
Why do the Voss try to stop you getting off the planet?
Why do the Voss oppose you?
Gormak and Voss fight a very long time. Gormak are warriors, don't know anything else. Maybe Voss don't know anything else either.
I'm not interested in angering the Voss.
I can't upset the Voss.
Me neither. I want peace. Gormak warriors build many great things, but they are too busy fighting Voss.
I don't know much, but I will help you if I can. If you help me go to the stars and find a new place for the Gormak.
Where can I find you?
Agreed.
You walk in dreams like I do. That's all I need.
You can help.
If you are sure.
We have an agreement, then. The ritual must take place in the Nightmare Lands. I'll meet you there.
Meet me at the Dark Heart.
I'm sorry. I can't.
Gormak king mad, wants endless war, destruction. Put me in cage for talking about reaching stars, finding peace.
Find me at the meeting-stone. Free me.
Go away. I busy.
The Dark Heart is an evil place. No Gormak should ever go here. No Gormak should ever make a ritual here.
I don't like it any more than you do, but I've come this far.
I know what you mean.
My stomach feels like sickness.
The sooner, the better.
Agree. I would not stay here any longer if I could.
It's not so bad. I wouldn't buy a house here, but maybe a vacation....
Stop complaining.
The corruption is deep in you or you are greatest warrior ever.
You are leader. What do we do?
We're supposed to start by walking in the dream.
Dream-walk.
I think we need to dream-walk and find this dream-rock thing.
We need the dream-rock.
I hope this is quick. This place is corruption.
I follow your lead.
This ritual is all very confusing.
I don't know.
You said we need to go to the dream-walking place, yes?
We start there. I follow your lead.
You can't kill him.
